skills.name: Install Parcel
skills.pattern: npm install parcel --save-dev

skills.name: CLI Commands
skills.pattern:
npx parcel src/index.html           # Dev server
npx parcel build src/index.html     # Production build
npx parcel watch src/index.html     # Watch mode

skills.name: Entry Points
skills.pattern:
<!-- src/index.html -->
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
  <head>
    <link rel="stylesheet" href="./styles.css">
  </head>
  <body>
    <script type="module" src="./index.js"></script>
  </body>
</html>

skills.name: JS Entry
Package Scripts
Auto Imports
TypeScript Support
React Support
CSS Processing
SASS/SCSS
PostCSS
Image Handling
Environment Variables
skills.pattern:
# .env
API_URL=https://api.example.com

// In code
process.env.API_URL

skills.name: Build Targets
Source Maps
Code Splitting
Tree Shaking
Build Cache
HTTPS Dev Server
skills.pattern: npx parcel src/index.html --https

skills.name: Custom Port
skills.pattern: npx parcel src/index.html --port 8080

skills.name: API Proxy
Library Mode
Public URL
Output Directory
skills.pattern: npx parcel build src/index.html --dist-dir build

skills.name: Web Workers
Parcel Config
Plugins
Scope Hoisting
Build Reporter
Monorepo Support
